nodes.text: Ulic's Redemption was a lightsaber crystal found in the galaxy during the Galactic Civil War.

Ulic's Redemption first appeared in Star Wars Galaxies, a 2003 MMORPG released by Sony Online Entertainment. The crystal was added to the game as part of the raid system in Hotfix 21.4. In some places in the game, the crystal was referred to as "Ulric's Redemption"; this article assumes that "Ulic's Redemption" was the correct spelling. The crystal shared the name of Ulic Qel-Droma, a Jedi turned Sith Lord who eventually returned to the light side during the days of the Old Republic. However, the game did not make any direct connection between the two.
